body.name: Aullsaty Toddler Toys Talking Flash Cards for 1 2 3 4 5 6 Year Old Boys and Girls, Autism Sensory Toys for Autistic Children, Learning Educational Montessori Speech Therapy 248 Sight Words Kids Gifts
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 42 mins
features: [ Toddler Montessori Learning Toys ] - The toddler educational talking flash cards is designed as a cute cat card reader which attracts children's interests and includes 248 sight words covering 14 subjects like animals, vehicles, letters, numbers, foods, fruits, vegetables, clothing, nature, colors, persons, jobs, shapes and daily necessities. The speech therapy toy teaches kids to learn with Montessori way by all kinds of animals’ and vehicles’ sounds with a lot of fun and interests.

[ Speech Therapy Autism Sensory Toys ] - Your kids can play and interact with the autism sensory toys by themselves with a very interesting upgraded Montessori learning way. It is a also great learning opportunity for autistic children to play with their families. The combination of sound and images enhance their ability to recognize and interact with new things on the cards, which is very suitable for autistic children and speech therapy sessions for children who do not talk.

[ Easy to Use ] - Just put the card into the cute cat machine's mouth ( card reader’s slot ), the American cat will pronounce the words with a standard American accent. The card reader makes a real animal or vehicle’s sound when an animal card or vehicle card is inserted. There are also letters and numbers cards for preschool children and more cards for kindergarten children, your toddler can press the repeat button to repeat the pronunciation and sound, adjust volume to 5 levels.

[ Perfect Gifts for Boys and Girls 1-6 Year Old ] - The ABC letters and 123 numbers as well as the cute image, animals’ and vehicles’ sounds and cat card reader is perfect gifts for preschool kids age 1-2 year old, more cute cards is perfect gifts for kindergarten kids age 3-6 year old. The learning sensory toy is a great gift for birthday, Christmas, Halloweens, Easter and back to school day. It can also be used home and in class, parents and teachers can teach little ones learning talking.

[ Rechargeable and Durable ] - Aullsaty toddler toy comes with a built-in rechargeable battery and a charger instead of extra batteries, It can be used up to 5 hours and no need to charge frequently. The cards is made of high quality double copper paper which is thicker and durable, not easy to bend. The toy is very portable and size is perfect for toddlers to hold and use. It is also equipped with a cute bag for easy storage of the cards and reader, perfect for children and families to travel.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Step 1 Insert a card into the cat's mouth ( reader slot ) Step 2 The cat ( reader ) will pronunciate the words in a standard American accent and make the real animals sounds Step 3 Press the repeat button to play again and press the volume button to adjust the volume to 5 levels.
Part list 1x Card Reader 124x Double sided cards 248x Sight words 1x USB Cable 1x User Guide 1x Unicorn bag Specification Dimension: 4.2x3.5x0.8 inches Weight: 2.48ounce Working hours: 5 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my 4 Year old!
reviews.reviewText: My 4 year old loves this. It is easy for her to use on her own, which she enjoys! She is able to put the cards in and out. It is lightweight and small so we bring it with us often to keep her entertained. It comes with a lot of cards to use, which is awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect. Comes with a small plastic drawstring bag to keep cards and toy in. Came with a lot of cards. Some of the cards have the word and the sound i.e. the dog card says “dog woof woof”. But the dress card just says “dress” because obviously a dress doesn’t make a sound. I’m a little disappointed that the letter cards don’t say the sound the letter makes. The cards are a tiny bit more sturdy than a regular card like in a deck of cards. The toy is smaller than I expected but perfect for a toddler’s hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for learning to talk or learning sight words
reviews.reviewText: I have a 2 year old that is still building his vocabulary and a 4 year old that is beginning to learn sight words.We use these for both kids to teach colors, animal sounds, shapes, and broaden vocabulary. We also use them to begin reading for my older son.An affordable educational toy that works for both ages.That’s a mom winMy only note is the cards are fairly flimsy and I wish they were laminated to make them a little more sturdy and less easy to bend/rip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Withstanding the test of toddler
reviews.reviewText: This is great, my kid loves it.The animal sounds are great, and it took her a while to understand how to operate it ((18mo) but now that she has it's a great toy she can use by herselfNeedless to say the cards take a beating from her, she folds them, soak them, and they are still useable and work.Good quality, highly recommend.Only downside is some of the word choice is bizarre, but plenty of useful words so it's not a big deal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This was a hit at Christmas. My Granddaughter loves it. There are plenty of cards that are easy to insert because of card thickness. It's educational and the price was really reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very educational and fun learning tool
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best learning tools for my 2 year old granddaughter. Easy to use with clear sounds and crisp pictures. Cards are labeled for easy use. Highly recommend using this learning tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The concept is great. The cards are thin and tend to bend easily. Also you have to hold it upside down to put the card in. It almost looks like a cat head and the ears have to face the bottom to put the card in the top. I’d like to see the cards a little heavier made. And some obvious cards aren’t included such as pizza.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super fun and interactive
reviews.reviewText: So much fun! The cards have codes and it reads the cards. Great for helping work on pronunciation!

these cards are a great way to help your child learn animals and numbers. I gifted it to my niece bc she’s always asking “what’s this” when looking around. Can’t wait to watch her learn and growThe cards themselves are very good quality and it makes learning easy and fun.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fun, Educational, and Durable Toy for Little Learners
reviews.reviewText: I recently introduced my just-under-2-year-old daughter to this toy, and it's been a hit. The toy comes with a variety of double-sided flashcards that you can insert into the reader. My daughter quickly got the hang of inserting the cards and loves the interactive aspect.Pros:- Educational: It's a great tool for teaching kids new words and letters.- Engaging: The interactive nature of the toy keeps children entertained.- Durability: It can withstand drops and rough play, making it suitable for young kids.- Adjustable Volume: The voice is clear, and the volume can be easily adjusted.- Large Card Collection: The set includes a wide range of cards, providing good value for the price.- Rechargeable: The toy comes with a built-in rechargeable battery.- Organization: It includes a drawstring bag for keeping everything together.Cons:- Card Orientation: Cards need to be inserted right side up; upside-down cards won't work, which can be frustrating for young children.- Cleanup: Kids may enjoy dumping out all the cards, leading to some cleanup for parents.- Age Range: While suitable for 2-4-year-olds, it may not hold the attention of older children.In summary, this toy is a fun and educational addition to a young child's playtime. It helps expand vocabulary, and its durability is a plus for active kids. While it could benefit from a few improvements, it's a great choice for toddlers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loads of cards to pick from to aid learning! 😊

I recently introduced the toddler toys talking flashcards to my little one, and they have been a game changer in our learning and playtime routine. These flashcards are for a delightful blend of education.My toddler in. Here's why I'm impressed the talking feature of the flashcards instantly engages toddlers with a simple touch. My toddler can hear the words pronounce clearly and encourages language development. The sturable design holds up against my toddler's rough handling. The flashcards are built to last. The cards are beautifully designed with vivid colors and attractive illustrations which captivates a child's attention. This toy has helped my child expand their vocabulary and is also made learning more exciting and an interactive experience. I couldn't be happily with this purchase and I highly recommend these flashcards to parents looking to combine fun and education in their child's play time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wonderful Talking Flashcard Toy! | Huge collection of double sided flashcards
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have my grandchildren in my home all week and am really big on them learning while having fun. I especially wanted to find a learning toy that would aid speech, reading and be engaging for my four and five year old grandchildren. This learning set is just amazing!I really love this product! It is wonderful for older toddlers and children with speech or language difficulties, English as a second language, Autism etc.First of all when you turn the kitten shaped card reader on, it warmly greets your child. There is a giant dec of two-sided cards that you insert and the device reads the word for them. I love that the vehicle and animal cards also have sound effects (watch the video). It makes reading and learning so fun.This set is well made and comes with a nice carry pouch to hold everything and a charging chord. Yes it is rechargeable, which is wonderful. The illustrations are very engaging and there is such a wide variety of words. They are colour coded and broken into groups like persons, vehicles, foods, vegetables, alphabet, numbers, essentials, animals etc.One of my granddaughters has speech issues and isn't speaking as well as she should. This toy makes her giggle and she tries to repeat the words which is really big! This is great for children learning English as these sight words are ones in every day speech, and will help them gain confidence in reading and speaking the language.This would be a great for gifting or for use by your own child.I highly recommend this product.
